page.title: 20 Living in Wiltshire
page.content: I like it where I live because it's not very noisy and the people are friendly. I like living here a lot because I am not far from a beach. The only thing I don't like is that everybody comes to this part of the country for their holidays. I don't like living here because there are no really exciting things to do. I like to live in a small country village as I was brought up in the countryside and I don't like smoke and fumes and dark streets. It's better in a village than a town because there's more space to play in. -------------------------------------- These pages have been written by children from{Langley Fitzurse Primary {School}and{Maud Heath Primary School.
